metadata.name: Fsutil Drive Enumeration
metadata.comment: Attackers may leverage fsutil to enumerated connected drives.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\fsutil.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('fsutil.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('drives')))

output.summary: Attackers may leverage fsutil to enumerated connected drives.

metadata.objective: False positive: Certain software or administrative tasks may trigger false positives. References: Turla has used fsutil fsinfo drives to list connected drives., https://github.com/elastic/detection-rules/blob/414d32027632a49fb239abb8fbbb55d3fa8dd861/rules/windows/discovery_peripheral_device.toml
